瓓字的基本解释

瓓
làn
〔瓓玕（
玉采。g乶 ）〕似玉的美石，如“长河结瓓瓓，层冰如玉岸。”

瓓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［làn］
［《集韻》郎旰切，去换，來。］
玉的色彩。参见“瓓玕”。
[②]［lán］
见“瓓2珊”。

瓓字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瓓； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页745第15
【集韻】【韻會】郞旰切【正韻】郞患切，?音爛。【集韻】玉采。◎按《正字通》入十六畫，非。今攺正。

瓓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瓓字的起名意思

指似玉的美石。

瓓
Basic explanation of words
瓓
làn
〔瓓玕(
Yucai. g 乶)] Beautiful stones that resemble jade, such as "the long river forms urns, and the layers of ice are like jade banks."
瓓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［làn］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ji cut, change, come. ]
The color of jade. See "Wang Kan".
[②]［lán］
See "Guan 2 Shan".
瓓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瓓; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 745 No. 15
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yin Xiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Yin is suffering from cutting,? The sound is bad. [Ji Yun] Yu Cai. ◎According to "Zhengzitong" to enter sixteen paintings, no. I am now.
瓓

Name meaning
Refers to the beautiful stone like jade.
